<div class=\"cta-desktop text -cta\">\n      <p>Established in 1989, our mission is to create environmental&nbsp;knowledge that encourages positive change. We do this&nbsp;by organising and transforming available environmental&nbsp;data into credible, science-based information products,&nbsp;delivered through innovative communication tools and&nbsp;capacity building services targeting relevant stakeholders.</p>\n    </div>\n    <div class=\"media js-video-player-play\">\n      <svg class=\"icon\">\n        <use xmlns:xlink=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink\" xlink:href=\"#icon-play\"></use>\n      </svg>\n    </div>\n  </div>\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"cta-mobile text -cta\">\n  <p>Established in 1989, our mission is to create environmental&nbsp;knowledge that encourages positive change. We do this&nbsp;by organising and transforming available environmental&nbsp;data into credible, science-based information products,&nbsp;delivered through innovative communication tools and&nbsp;capacity building services targeting relevant stakeholders.</p>\n</div>\n\n<section class=\"l-main-content -news home\" data-section=\"news\">\n  <div class=\"row\">\n    <div class=\"card-description\">\n        <h3 class=\"text -title-card\">Polar and Mountain Environments</h3>\n        <p class=\"text -summary\">The polar and high mountains are the planets barometers, telling us a great deal about the present and future effects of climate change.&nbsp; </p>\n          <p class=\"card-meta\">\n              <span class=\"text -meta\">In progress</span>\n              <span class=\"text -meta\">Programme</span>\n          </p>\n      </div>\n    </article>\n</a></div><div class=\"item js_slide slide\">\n  <a href=\"/activities/37\">\n    <article class=\"c-card\" exchange on successful approaches to marine and coastal management. </p>\n          <p class=\"card-meta\">\n              <span class=\"text -meta\">In progress</span>\n              <span class=\"text -meta\">Marine</span>\n          </p>\n      </div>\n    </article>\n</a></div></div><div class=\"masonry-column size-1of2\"><div class=\"item js_slide slide\">\n  <a class=\"c-main-content-header\">\n        <h2 class=\"text -title-block\">Featured publications</h2>\n          <p class=\"text -view-all\">\n            <a href=\"/publications\">\n              <span>\n                View all publications\n              </span>\n                <svg class=\"icon -arrow\">\n                  <use xmlns:xlink=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink\" <div class=\"c-slider slider js_slider\" data-slider-type=\"card\">\n        <div class=\"frame js_frame\">\n          <div class=\"masonry-layout masonry-1-1-2-3 slides js_slides\" data-columns=\"2\"><div class=\"masonry-column size-1of2\"><div class=\"item js_slide slide\">\n  <a href=\"/publications/341\">\n    <article class=\"c-card\" data-card-type=\"publication\">\n        <div class=\"card-pic\" style=\"background-image: url('http://gridarendal-website.s3.amazonaws.com/production/publications/:s_picture/341/medium/PubBack.png?1490352765')\"></div>\n      <div class=\"card-description\">\n        <h3 class=\"text -title-card\">The Socio-Economics of the West, Central and Southern African Coastal Communities</h3>\n        <p class=\"text -summary\">People living along the west, central and southern African coast are directly dependent on the health of Large Marine Ecosystems (LMEs)</p>\n          <p class=\"card-meta\">\n              <span class=\"text -meta\">25 days ago</span>\n              <span class=\"text -meta\">Partner Publications</span>\n          </p>\n      </div>\n    </article>\n</a></div><div class=\"item js_slide slide\">\n  <a href=\"/publications/328\">\n    <article class=\"c-card\" data-card-type=\"publication\">\n        <div class=\"card-pic\" style=\"background-image: url('http://gridarendal-website.s3.amazonaws.com/production/publications/:s_picture/328/medium/PubBack.png?1489584717')\"></div>\n      <div class=\"card-description\">\n        <h3 class=\"text -title-card\">Lake Victoria Basin - Atlas of Our Changing Environment</h3>\n        <p class=\"text -summary\">Supporting a population of 40 million, the Lake Basin provides a variety of economic and development opportunities.</p>\n          <p class=\"card-meta\">\n              <span class=\"text -meta\">1 month ago</span>\n              <span class=\"text -meta\">Environment Atlas</span>\n          </p>\n      </div>\n    </article>\n</a></div></div><div class=\"masonry-column size-1of2\"><div class=\"item js_slide slide\">\n  <a href=\"/publications/340\">\n    <article class=\"c-card\" data-card-type=\"publication\">\n        <div class=\"card-pic\" style=\"background-image: url('http://gridarendal-website.s3.amazonaws.com/production/publications/:s_picture/340/medium/PubBack.png?1490352360')\"></div>\n      <div class=\"card-description\">\n        <h3 class=\"text -title-card\">Blue Carbon Financing of Mangrove Conservation In The Abidjan Convention Region</h3>\n        <p class=\"text -summary\">The coast of West, Central and Southern Africa contains approximately 14 per cent of the worlds mangrove area.</p>\n          <p class=\"card-meta\">\n              <span class=\"text -meta\">26 days ago</span>\n              <span class=\"text -meta\">Partner Publications</span>\n          </p>\n      </div>\n    </article>\n</a></div></div></div>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n    </div>\n  </div>\n</section>\n\n\n<section class=\"l-main-content -media-library home\" data-section=\"related-media\">\n  <div class=\"row\">\n    <div class=\"small-12 columns\">\n      <div class=\"c-main-content-header\">\n        <h2
